title: peaceful Bholenath's temple
review: Rawli temple is one of the very old temples in Agra. Its peaceful & would give one lots of positive energy. Easy to approach.

title: Spiritual & religious temple
review: This is very old Shiva temple of Agra. Local people visit the temple on every Monday in large number. It is very much crowded on Mondays. We went on Wednesday and it was very easy to have Darshan. Temple has got closing/opening timings. It is situated on the main road inside the city. Local people have firm faith that what they ask for in their life from Lord Shiva, they get it. It is advisable to visit the temple except on Monday to avoid crowd.

title: JAI SHIV ,bam bam bhole
review: This is a very old temple of Lord Shiva and it is near to district administration office on main M G Road,Agra .

title: Peaceful Place
review: Here you got positive vibes when you enter the temple.  It was the oldest temple and local people have very much faith  in this temple.

title: Rawli Temple is a Mandir of Bhagwan Shiv
review: Rawli temple is a old Mandir of Bhagwan Shiv situated in the middle of Agra. building is old & peaceful. Shiv-Darshan gives me immense peace.

title: Great Temple of Bhole Baba
review: Rawli maharaj temple is a very old and great temple of lord shiva. Most beautiful and peaceful place.

title: Shiva temple
review: Lord Shiva's place. Here you got positive vibes when you enter the temple. It was the oldest temple and local people have very much faith in this temple.  Local people visit the temple on every Monday in large number. It is very much crowded on Mondays. We went on Wednesday and it was very easy to have Darshan. Temple has got closing/opening timings. It is situated on the main road inside the city. Local people have firm faith that what they ask for in their life from Lord Shiva, they get it. It is advisable to visit the temple except on Monday to avoid crowd.

title: Old temple and whole Agra people visit
review: I used to go with my grand-mother. Very old shiv temple. Outside Hanuman ji temple and inside lane shiv temple. Now Shivling is not that visible the way it was in 1990s. There is mela on every monday as people from all over Agra come here to worship.

title: ancient Shiva Temple
review: It is the ancient Shiva temple where one got positive vibes when he enter the temple. Local people have very much faith in this temple.Every Monday local people visit the temple in large number.It is situated on the main road inside the city.According to me one should visit the temple except Monday.It is a peaceful neat and clean place.

title: Lord Shiva Temple
review: Temple of Lord Shiva Situated on Lifeline of Agra - Mahatma Gandhi Road. Well Connected to Road & A Divine Place.
